message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.DB, cs.LG, cs.CC

The paper discusses privacy protection in databases, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). It also uses information-theoretic concepts such as Shannon entropy and mutual information, which are part of information theory (cs.IT). The paper specifically focuses on modeling the query system, which is related to databases (cs.DB). The comparison between differential privacy and mutual information involves statistical learning and inference, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper also touches on the concept of Bayes risk, which is related to computational complexity (cs.CC).
